event.description: Jean Segura grounds out, third baseman Alex Bregman to first baseman Marwin Gonzalez.
Mitch Haniger strikes out swinging.
Robinson Cano doubles (1) on a fly ball to left fielder Carlos Beltran.
Nelson Cruz strikes out swinging.
Kyle Seager grounds out, shortstop Carlos Correa to first baseman Marwin Gonzalez.
Danny Valencia grounds out, second baseman Jose Altuve to first baseman Marwin Gonzalez.
Leonys Martin strikes out swinging.
Mike Zunino called out on strikes.
Jarrod Dyson grounds out, second baseman Jose Altuve to first baseman Marwin Gonzalez.
Jean Segura strikes out swinging.
Mitch Haniger doubles (1) on a sharp ground ball to shortstop Carlos Correa.
Robinson Cano grounds out, second baseman Jose Altuve to first baseman Marwin Gonzalez. Mitch Haniger to 3rd.
Nelson Cruz strikes out swinging.
Lance McCullers intentionally walks Kyle Seager.
Danny Valencia singles on a soft ground ball to third baseman Alex Bregman. Mitch Haniger scores. Kyle Seager to 2nd.
Leonys Martin reaches on a fielding error by first baseman Marwin Gonzalez. Kyle Seager to 3rd. Danny Valencia to 2nd.
Mike Zunino grounds out, shortstop Carlos Correa to first baseman Marwin Gonzalez.
Jarrod Dyson grounds out softly, third baseman Alex Bregman to first baseman Marwin Gonzalez.
Jean Segura called out on strikes.
Mitch Haniger reaches on a throwing error by third baseman Alex Bregman.
Robinson Cano walks. Mitch Haniger to 2nd.
Nelson Cruz grounds into a force out, shortstop Carlos Correa to second baseman Jose Altuve. Robinson Cano out at 2nd.
Kyle Seager singles on a soft ground ball to pitcher Lance McCullers.
Danny Valencia grounds into a force out, third baseman Alex Bregman to second baseman Jose Altuve. Kyle Seager out at 2nd. Danny Valencia to 1st.
Leonys Martin lines out to center fielder George Springer.
Mike Zunino singles on a sharp ground ball to shortstop Carlos Correa. Danny Valencia to 2nd.
Jarrod Dyson grounds out to pitcher Lance McCullers.
Pitching Change: Will Harris replaces Lance McCullers.
Jean Segura pops out to second baseman Jose Altuve.
Mitch Haniger called out on strikes.
Robinson Cano grounds out sharply, second baseman Jose Altuve to first baseman Marwin Gonzalez.
Defensive switch from center field to right field for George Springer.
Defensive Substitution: Jake Marisnick replaces left fielder Carlos Beltran, batting 5th, playing center field.
Defensive switch from right field to left field for Josh Reddick.
Pitching Change: Luke Gregerson replaces Will Harris.
Nelson Cruz flies out to right fielder George Springer.
Kyle Seager grounds out, first baseman Marwin Gonzalez to pitcher Luke Gregerson.
Danny Valencia singles on a line drive to left fielder Josh Reddick.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Taylor Motter replaces Danny Valencia.
Leonys Martin strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Ken Giles replaces Luke Gregerson.
Mike Zunino strikes out swinging.
Jarrod Dyson doubles (1) on a line drive to right fielder George Springer.
Jean Segura grounds out, third baseman Alex Bregman to first baseman Marwin Gonzalez.
Mitch Haniger strikes out swinging.
George Springer reaches on a fielding error by third baseman Kyle Seager.
Alex Bregman grounds into a double play, third baseman Kyle Seager to second baseman Robinson Cano to first baseman Danny Valencia. George Springer out at 2nd.
Mariners challenged (play at 1st), call on the field was overturned: Jose Altuve grounds out, shortstop Jean Segura to first baseman Danny Valencia.
Carlos Correa strikes out swinging.
Carlos Beltran grounds out, third baseman Kyle Seager to first baseman Danny Valencia.
Josh Reddick grounds out, third baseman Kyle Seager to first baseman Danny Valencia.
Evan Gattis flies out to left fielder Jarrod Dyson.
Brian McCann homers (1) on a line drive to left field.
Marwin Gonzalez strikes out swinging.
George Springer walks.
With Alex Bregman batting, George Springer caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Mike Zunino to shortstop Jean Segura.
Alex Bregman flies out to left fielder Jarrod Dyson.
Jose Altuve flies out to right fielder Mitch Haniger.
Carlos Correa walks.
Carlos Beltran grounds out, second baseman Robinson Cano to first baseman Danny Valencia.
Josh Reddick grounds out, pitcher Hisashi Iwakuma to first baseman Danny Valencia.
Evan Gattis walks.
Brian McCann grounds into a double play, first baseman Danny Valencia to third baseman Kyle Seager to first baseman Danny Valencia. Evan Gattis out at 2nd.
Marwin Gonzalez homers (1) on a fly ball to center field.
George Springer singles on a line drive to right fielder Mitch Haniger.
With Alex Bregman batting, George Springer caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Mike Zunino to second baseman Robinson Cano to first baseman Danny Valencia.
Alex Bregman grounds out, second baseman Robinson Cano to first baseman Danny Valencia.
Jose Altuve singles on a ground ball to shortstop Jean Segura.
Carlos Correa grounds into a force out, shortstop Jean Segura to second baseman Robinson Cano. Jose Altuve out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Evan Scribner replaces Hisashi Iwakuma.
Carlos Beltran flies out to left fielder Jarrod Dyson.
Josh Reddick singles on a line drive to center fielder Leonys Martin.
Evan Gattis grounds into a force out, third baseman Kyle Seager to second baseman Robinson Cano. Josh Reddick out at 2nd. Evan Gattis to 1st.
Pitching Change: Marc Rzepczynski replaces Evan Scribner.
Brian McCann grounds out, second baseman Robinson Cano to first baseman Danny Valencia.
Taylor Motter remains in the game as the first baseman.
Pitching Change: Dan Altavilla replaces Marc Rzepczynski.
Marwin Gonzalez flies out to center fielder Leonys Martin.
George Springer strikes out swinging.
Alex Bregman pops out to second baseman Robinson Cano.
